posts.author: webshaman1
posts.content:
Vader is a strong Force user, maybe the strongest ever seen.

And he likes to use the Force to hold others in place, crush their windpipe with an "invisible hand" and move things about - quite heavy things.

As such, he probably has many more levels of Sorc, I am thinking.  Also, with his crippled body, probably almost half machine, that should somehow be taken into account.

So what about Sorc/PM/Blackguard?

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content: Vader is also good with a sword, so how about Fighter 6 / Blackguard 8 / Sorcerer 26, with Fighter 4 / Blackguard 8 / Sorcerer 8 pre-epic for 4 attacks per round?  The  CHA would end at 20 and the STR at probably around 24 or 26 or so.

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
Not having the time to write the build, but off the top of my head, I would go with something like Sorcerer 30/ Fighter 6/ Blackguard 4 & replace BG with Paladin for Jedi Masters like Mace Windu, to better represent the "power in the force". Perhaps Sorc 32/ Ftr 4/ BG 4 even, depending on the epic spellcasting feats. Orion's build is also a good take on them if you go for raw power instead, few things can match an RDD build.
I remember this concept has appeared in WoG forums as well, from what I remember they went with Sorc/Monk/Ftr instead, which is an interesting approach too. If you search a little on their build section I'm sure you'll find the thread.
